segments.text: Hey Joe , how have you been ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am doing well . How about you , Mary ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is a new movie at the mall that I want to see . Want to go with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't because I already promised my roommate that I would go shopping with her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I could go to the movies on Friday night instead . Would that be better ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you have a certain movie in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought the movie about a serial killer who rapes and mutilates his victims would be a good choice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I kind of wanted to see “ The Secret Life of Bees . ”
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we can think of something somewhere between a chick flick and a horror movie !
segments.speaker: S2
